sentences.sContent: The history never if, the history has sinuate fact only.
sentences.sContent_eng: The history never if, the history has sinuate fact only.
sentences.sCn: 历史从来没有假如，历史只有弯弯曲曲的事实。

sentences.sContent: Margin of leaf blade sinuate ; styles 3–3.5 mm, slightly curved towards apex.
sentences.sContent_eng: Margin of leaf blade sinuate ; styles 3–3.5 mm, slightly curved towards apex.
sentences.sCn: 叶片的边缘具深波状；花柱3-3.5毫米，对于先端的稍弯曲。

words.tran: 蜿蜒地，弯曲地；拐弯抹角地；错综复杂地
弯曲；弯曲处；错综复杂；曲折度

trans.tranCn: 弯弯曲曲的, 波状的
trans.tranOther: (of leaves) having a strongly waved margin
